name: Dynamic Balance Training
description: Training the body to maintain stability during movement and sport-specific actions.

cards.title: Agility Ladder & Balance Coordination
cards.description: Improving footwork, reaction time, and balance with ladder drills.
bulletpoints: Perform single-leg ladder drills for increased difficulty
Maintain control during rapid footwork transitions
Incorporate multidirectional movements to enhance coordination

cards.title: Unstable Surface Training for Core Control
cards.description: Enhancing core stability using balance pads, wobble boards, or foam surfaces.
bulletpoints: Perform exercises on an unstable surface to activate stabilizer muscles
Increase difficulty by incorporating dynamic movements
Progress by using one arm or one leg to challenge stability
